description:
Asfahan Oud EDP - A Majestic Oriental Masterpiece

Experience the luxurious allure of Asfahan Oud Eau de Parfum, a captivating fragrance that embodies the rich heritage of Middle Eastern perfumery. This exquisite 100ML creation transports you to the mystical landscapes of ancient Persia, where premium oud reigns supreme among precious ingredients. âœ¨

The Essence of Asfahan Oud

This magnificent oud fragrance opens with an intoxicating blend of spicy and woody notes that immediately command attention. The rich oud base creates a sophisticated symphony that evolves beautifully throughout the day, making it perfect for those who appreciate Arabic perfumes with exceptional longevity and sillage. ðŸ”¥

Fragrance Journey of Asfahan Oud

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Saffron, Bergamot, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes Rose, Jasmine, Amber
Base Notes Agarwood (Oud), Vanilla, Musk, Patchouli

  • ðŸ’« Suitable for special occasions and evening wear

Originating from the ancient perfume traditions of the Middle East, Asfahan Oud pays homage to the legendary city of Isfahan, once the capital of Persia and a center for art and culture. The brand meticulously crafts each oud perfume using time-honored techniques that have been passed down through generations, ensuring an authentic luxury fragrance experience.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Asfahan Oud EDP last on skin?

Asfahan Oud EDP boasts exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-12 hours on skin due to its high concentration of premium oud and fixative ingredients. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin, and consider layering with unscented lotion to extend the fragrance experience even further. Many users report the rich oud base notes remaining detectable well into the next day. âœ¨

Indulge in the opulent world of Asfahan Oud and discover why this prestigious fragrance has become a signature scent for discerning perfume connoisseurs worldwide. ðŸ”¥

This opulent 100ML perfume offers exceptional longevity with its rich blend of precious woods and amber, creating an unforgettable signature scent for the discerning fragrance connoisseur. âœ¨
